title: Beni Tsubaki
description:
Kisshouin Tsubaki aka the "Crimson Camellia", a beautiful lady reporter of the occult, wants to satisfy her intellectual curiosity by having a hands-on experience with every Yokai she can find.
Follow her in her travels, accompanied by her trusted cameraman Yokomizo-kun.

[b][u]Spanish / Español [/u][/b][spoiler]Kisshouin Tsubaki alias la "Camelia Carmesí", una bella reportera de lo oculto, quiere satisfacer su curiosidad intelectual teniendo una experiencia práctica con cada Yokai que pueda encontrar.
Sígala en sus viajes, acompañada por su confiable camarógrafo Yokomizo-kun.[/spoiler]
